name: Overview
main:
Almost 10% of the population is in need of humanitarian assistance, primarily in Far North, North, Adamaoua, and East regions. Conflict in both Nigeria and CAR has led to displacement of refugees to Cameroon. Boko Haram attacks in the Far North region have decreased in frequency since the second half of 2016 than in the beginning of 2016. Needs remain high in Minawao camp, which hosts more than 61,000 refugees . ?

INFORM considers that the risk of humanitarian crisis varies widely, from very high in the Far North to very low in western areas of the country. Nationally, the risk is 6.2/10. Hazard and exposure risk stands at 6.8, and lack of coping capacity at 6/10. ?
